Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: River Market is the hub of New Westminster’s public quay. Surrounded by boardwalks situated on the shores of the Fraser River, the complex offers an abundance of shops, services, cafés and restaurants, all within walking distance of SkyTrain. The opportunity is located on the second floor with outstanding unobstructed views of the Fraser River, featuring fully improved and ready to-go education space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | 6,500 PLUG & PLAY EDUCATION SPACE

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located between Royal Avenue and 10th Street.
Located between Royal Avenue and 10th Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Opportunity to lease approx. 20,000-sf with direct exposure and high visibility along busy Columbia Street in New Westminster. 1001 Columbia is a part of Columbia Square Plaza, home to notable retailers such as Save-On-Foods, Rona, BMO, Boston Pizza, and others, providing excellent amenities to area tenants.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | 19,756 SF AVAILABLE CLOSE TO SKYTRAIN
